participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Driven and enthusiastic; enjoys motivating others and leading a healthy lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and laid-back; enjoys the social aspects of fitness and has a passion for cars.
participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.

content.text: Whazzup? I like to run and watch marathons.
